nodes.text: The Gilded Thranta was an FX-77 Star Yacht owned by Falloon during the Yuuzhan Vong War. Armed with two turret-mounter, top and bottom mounted laser cannons, and a concussion missile launcher, Falloon gave the ship to a group of mercenaries who had given him safe passage off Sriluur after he surrendered 9T-LOM to a group of former Black Sun leaders on Coruscant.
